snippet: A Roman Catholic Church official will remain in prison while he fights his conviction for failing to protect a boy from a predatory priest.
abstract: Monsignor William J Lynn, a Roman Catholic Church official, is ordered by Judge M Teresa Sarmina of Philadelphia Common Pleas Court to remain in prison while he fights his conviction for failing to protect a boy from a predatory priest.
lead_paragraph: A Roman Catholic Church official will remain in prison while he fights his conviction for failing to protect a boy from a predatory priest.

headline.seo: Pennsylvania: Monsignor William J. Lynn Is Refused Bail
